name: Swallow
effect: Must have used the move "Stockpile" prior to this Move, otherwise it will fail. If successful spend 1 Will point to activate. The User may remove the Stat Changes from "Stockpile", and recovers 6 HP for each swallowed (if the User has Stockpiled multiple times they may choose how many to expend). For each use of Stockpile expended beyond the first the User themself of a Status. If 3 Stockpiles are Swallowed increase the Will cost to activate to 2. Only applies healing under stress.
description: The Pokemon swallows the energy she was storing to restore some damage, it recovers its normal size afterwards.
